img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 94.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Wukong_Thunderclap_94.jpg)
Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment.
img_below_text:
After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, you'll be able to leave the enchanted seed sack and continue your pursuit of Yellowbrow, but not in the way you might expect.
Macaque Chief (Mahavira Hall)
summary_promot:

Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment."
        - Following Text: "After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, you'll be able to leave the enchanted seed sack and continue your pursuit of Yellowbrow, but not in the way you might expect.
Macaque Chief (Mahavira Hall)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist in a richly detailed, red-lit environment with intricate patterns and carvings, possibly signifying a significant narrative or boss encounter. The preceding text describes the Macaque Chief's abilities, while the following text indicates the conclusion of the battle and progression in the story. This image likely represents the climactic moment of the fight against the Macaque Chief in Mahavira Hall.
